short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant Git feature branch name creator for JIRA issues

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension that streamlines the process of creating Git feature branch names from Jira issue IDs and descriptions.

What's New in Version 1.0.1:
• Improved consistency in the user interface for a more seamless experience.
• Branch names now automatically exclude special characters for better compatibility.
